name: Violent Hippo Gone Wild
description: Hippos, they're dangerous creatures for sure! But what would happen should one go wild? Well, this game is sure to show you exactly how humanity would be doomed! Take on the role as the violent hippo that has gone wild to cause destruction and chaos to the world around you! And don't let any pesky humans stop you either, they're just a free meal that doesn't know their place yet...
